title: WTT: Colts-Panthers tickets for T206 - NO LONGER AVAILABLE
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT: Colts-Panthers tickets for T206 - NO LONGER AVAILABLE
posts.post_content:
This my be a first on the BST...

Having trouble selling the last pair of Colts season tickets on Stubhub and time is running out.  Seats are in Section 427, Row 9.  Game is on 11/27.  These are in the south end zone of Lucas Oil Stadium with a nice view of the downtown skyline.  Face value is $79 per ticket... looking to get in the neighborhood of $75-$80 in T206 trade for the pair.
How many t206's will you give me if i take these tickets?

Well... Not the trade I expected, but it did make me laugh out loud! I could throw in my #12 Andrew Luck Colts jersey that I wore to the Falcons game if that helps.  On second thought the jersey is definitely a keeper.

Does this include Airfare?
I was at the Falcon Disater... Then we went to Notre Dame for my Son's School Visit... He Love'd it....
I was able to get a friend to take the tickets, but, alas, not for T206s...
I bid one empty PSA holder that once held a psa 5 t206, label in tact, holder snapped in half.  You must post mailing fees however.
